views.name: Default view
views.description: The default view of the data.

views.name: A primary cilium
views.description: A primary cilium with axoneme and centrioles of wild-type mouse pancreatic islet cells treated with 16.7 mM glucose, as described in Fig. 4b of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Intermingled microvilli
views.description: Intermingled microvilli of wild-type mouse pancreatic islet cells treated with 16.7 mM glucose, as described in Fig. 4c of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Secretory granules
views.description: Ultrastructural diversity among insulin secretory granules containing rod-shaped or spherical crystals of wild-type mouse pancreatic islet cells treated with 16.7 mM glucose, as described in Fig. 4d of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Secretory granules and endoplasmic reticulum
views.description: Close contacts between secretory granules and endoplasmic reticulum of wild-type mouse pancreatic islet cells treated with 16.7 mM glucose, as described in Fig. 4e of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Microtubules and Golgi apparatus
views.description: Microtubules and Golgi apparatus of wild-type mouse pancreatic islet cells treated with 16.7 mM glucose, as described in Fig. 4f of Xu et al. 2020c.
